summary.p: Recommends fellow believers who are traveling to Italy for medical studies and would like to take this opportunity to get to know the scholars of Zurich. Regards.

div.p: Greetings. I commend these brothers to you. They wish to converse with you and to know you. They both know and love Christ; therefore, they are worthy of your favor. They are traveling to Italy for the study of medicine.
Farewell in Christ the Lord and love me. Farewell with everyone. Your S. Grynaeus.
To Lord H. Bullinger, dearest friend and brother. Zurich.
